function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of standardization of protocols and networks for urban technology","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate disaster management policy","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of disease propagation in disaster-affected areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Architects and urban planners not being involved in pandemic planning and response","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perception of emergency response as an engineering challenge rather than a design challenge","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient time to plan and design pandemic response infrastructure","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disaster management protocols for architectural and urban institutions for biological disasters like disease epidemics","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of preparedness and response to pandemics despite the availability of modern technologies","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of standardization of protocols for seamless communication in the healthcare sector","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of pandemic preparedness in urban planning and architecture","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of 5g application scenarios","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"5g-enabled ultrasound may lead to misdiagnosis and inappropriate treatment of patients.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on 5g for contact tracing may lead to privacy and security risks for individuals’ data.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid deployment of 5g infrastructure without proper guidelines and monitoring may contribute to electromagnetic field exposure and public health concerns.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent large-scale outbreaks of infectious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid variation of some viruses","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges of public management in pandemic control","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex social systems leading to lower stability and restrictions on public health measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"5g technology as a disruptive innovation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High bandwidth and low latency of 5g enable efficient delivery of iot data, increasing the risk of rapid spread of contagious diseases through iot devices.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ai technology can predict the spread of diseases and assist in finding cures, leading to the potential misuse of ai for bioterrorism or deliberate disease spread.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Telemedicine and digitalized prevention measures may create a false sense of security, leading to reduced adherence to physical distancing and other preventive measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious diseases transmission within the built environment due to increased use of iot and interconnected devices.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of universal commercialization of 5g technology","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient research on business and social value of 5g","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of rumors and panic related to 5g technology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of conspiracy theories related to 5g and covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of 5g’s business and social value in pandemic prevention and control research","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of focus on digital materiality’s impact on innovation in dynamic environments","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"5g-enabled pandemic control and prevention may lead to increased reliance on technology and decreased human interaction, potentially impacting mental and emotional well-being.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The rapid deployment of 5g technology for pandemic control may lead to privacy and security concerns related to data collection and monitoring.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on 5g technology for pandemic control may exacerbate the digital divide, leaving certain populations with limited access to essential services and information.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge and protection leading to rapid spread of covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"New phenomenon and lack of extant literature","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Spread of virus through close contact","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lockdown of city and closure of public transport","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strict public management and restricted daily life","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scattered outbreaks due to imported cases and goods","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on unverified data sources for research","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of misinformation through microblog and wechat","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public perception of 5g technology and pandemic prevention","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear data analysis process and methodology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate validation and triangulation of sources","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of confirmation bias in data analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of medical resources, especially doctors and nurses, leading to lack of timely diagnosis and treatment for covid-19 infectors.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of medical images and test reports through 5g network.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tele-treatment technology may lead to potential data security and privacy risks due to the transmission of sensitive medical information over a network.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliability and quality of remote treatment may be compromised due to network connectivity issues, leading to ineffective or delayed treatment for infectors.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid deployment of tele-treatment technology may lead to lack of standardization and oversight, resulting in inadequately trained personnel and potential errors in treatment procedures.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of 5g technology for telemedicine and tele-treatment may lead to potential network vulnerabilities and security breaches.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
